detectors.description: Crowdsale.createTokens() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#290-301) ignores return value by token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#300)

Crowdsale.finishMinting() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#283-288) ignores return value by token.finishMinting() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#287)

Crowdsale.finishMinting() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#283-288) ignores return value by token.mint(devs_addr,restrictedTokens) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#286)

Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#180-183) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#182)

Crowdsale.createTokens() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#290-301) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now < start_ico + (period * 86400).div(3) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#294)
detectors.markdown:
[Crowdsale.createTokens()](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#L290-L301) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [now < start_ico + (period * 86400).div(3)](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33408718461f21e6fc4f71802cbe81ae4369ff33_Apiary.sol#L294)
